item.title: [Python] Graph database Neo4j for Python for beginners (for Mac OS X)
item.description: I'm a beginner, while saying "Introduction to graph database Neo4j for Python for beginners" in Python, so I'm sorry. I will introduce the environment construction to operate Neo4j with Python and a sample to play around with the data. #1. Introducing Neo4j# First, let's start by installing Neo4J on Mac OS X. Since my environment is Yosemite 10.10.2, I would appreciate if you can let me know in the comments if there are any errors due to the difference in environment.
